name: Fampla
subtitle: Self-Hosted Family Organization
description: Complete family organization platform with calendar, shopping lists, recipes, and todos. Self-hosted for complete privacy.

apps.name: Fampla
apps.subtitle: Family Organization Platform

versions.localizedDescription:
üìù Enhanced Markdown Editor & UI Fixes

‚úÖ Markdown Editor Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Auto-completion for markdown lists - Press Enter to continue lists automatically
‚Ä¢ Interactive checkboxes in rendered markdown - Click checkboxes to toggle [ ] ‚Üî [x]
‚Ä¢ Supports unordered lists (-, *), ordered lists (1., 2.), and task lists (- [ ], - [x])
‚Ä¢ Smart list detection with proper indentation handling
‚Ä¢ Checkboxes work in both note detail view and preview cards

üé® UI/UX Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Fixed UI overflow issues in notes screens
‚Ä¢ Scrollable content prevents layout errors
‚Ä¢ Enhanced markdown preview with GitHub-flavored syntax
‚Ä¢ Real-time checkbox updates without manual editing
‚Ä¢ Better note creation and editing experience

üîß Technical Enhancements:
‚Ä¢ RegExp pattern matching for intelligent list auto-completion
‚Ä¢ GestureDetector-based interactive checkbox rendering
‚Ä¢ Proper state management for checkbox toggling
‚Ä¢ flutter_markdown with checkboxBuilder support
‚Ä¢ Enhanced TextEditingController with onChanged callbacks

üîÑ Calendar Sync Fix & Debug Logging

‚úÖ Calendar Sync Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Fixed calendar sync to use default calendar instead of non-existent 'imported' calendar
‚Ä¢ Synced events now appear correctly in your Fampla calendar
‚Ä¢ Added comprehensive debug logging for troubleshooting
‚Ä¢ Import from iOS Calendar: ‚úÖ Working
‚Ä¢ Export to iOS Calendar: ‚úÖ Working

üîß Technical Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Improved type safety with device_calendar package
‚Ä¢ Fixed namespace conflicts between Fampla Calendar and iOS Calendar
‚Ä¢ Events automatically assigned to default or first available calendar
‚Ä¢ Detailed sync status messages in debug console

üì± User Experience:
‚Ä¢ Calendar sync now displays all imported events
‚Ä¢ Clear sync success/failure messages
‚Ä¢ Better calendar selection UI
‚Ä¢ Improved error handling

Bitte in der Kalender-Verwaltung einen iOS-Kalender ausw√§hlen und 'Jetzt synchronisieren' klicken!

üé® Sidebar Improvements & Navigation Fixes

‚úÖ Sidebar Enhancements:
‚Ä¢ Fixed sidebar overflow issues - now properly scrollable
‚Ä¢ Shopping sidebar now displays correctly on all screen sizes
‚Ä¢ All navigation buttons now work correctly
‚Ä¢ Calendar settings navigation fixed (/calendar/management)

üîß Technical Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Made shopping sidebar scrollable with SingleChildScrollView
‚Ä¢ Fixed ListView sizing with shrinkWrap in sidebars
‚Ä¢ Corrected navigation routes to match app router structure
‚Ä¢ Removed non-functional navigation buttons
‚Ä¢ Enhanced sidebar responsiveness

üì± User Experience:
‚Ä¢ Sidebars adapt perfectly to all screen heights
‚Ä¢ No more buffer overflow when opening sidebars
‚Ä¢ Smooth scrolling in all sidebar views
‚Ä¢ Settings and management screens now accessible
‚Ä¢ Better visual consistency across the app

üé® UI Improvements & Design Fixes

‚úÖ UI/UX Enhancements:
‚Ä¢ Reverted liquid glass design for better visibility
‚Ä¢ Fixed calendar management navigation
‚Ä¢ Improved Material Design 3 card consistency
‚Ä¢ Simplified calendar management UI

üóìÔ∏è Calendar Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Removed complex calendar visibility toggles
‚Ä¢ Unified calendar management screen
‚Ä¢ Better navigation flow in calendar settings
‚Ä¢ Enhanced glass card design throughout app

üîß Technical Changes:
‚Ä¢ Clean Material Design 3 implementation
‚Ä¢ Optimized calendar provider state management
‚Ä¢ Removed unnecessary UI complexity
‚Ä¢ Better theme integration across all screens

üåç Complete Internationalization Support

‚ú® New Features:
‚Ä¢ Complete German/English support for all 21 screens
‚Ä¢ 886 translations per language
‚Ä¢ Professional idiomatic translations (not literal)
‚Ä¢ Dynamic language switching via device settings

üé® Localization Improvements:
‚Ä¢ All user-facing text now fully localized
‚Ä¢ Parametrized translations for dynamic content
‚Ä¢ Context-appropriate translations for family app
‚Ä¢ Both navigation and content properly translated

üîß Technical Implementation:
‚Ä¢ Flutter i18n/l10n system fully integrated
‚Ä¢ ARB files for English (app_en.arb) and German (app_de.arb)
‚Ä¢ AppLocalizations generated from ARB files
‚Ä¢ Optimized build performance with tree-shaking

üì± User Experience:
‚Ä¢ Seamless language switching
‚Ä¢ Consistent translations across entire app
‚Ä¢ Professional quality German and English text
‚Ä¢ Ready for additional language support

üé® Light Mode Readability Fixes

‚úÖ UI/UX Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Fixed white text on white background in light mode
‚Ä¢ All AppBar titles and icons now use theme-based colors
‚Ä¢ Template editor modal completely theme-adapted
‚Ä¢ Auto-todo dialogs modernized with proper light/dark mode support

üìã Enhanced Todo Display:
‚Ä¢ Event-linked todos show prominent orange badge with event title
‚Ä¢ Fixed overflow in completed todos section
‚Ä¢ Improved visibility of todo metadata (date, category, priority)
‚Ä¢ Better contrast in both light and dark modes

üîß Technical Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Replaced all hardcoded Colors.white with theme colors
‚Ä¢ Consistent Glass Card design system maintained
‚Ä¢ Proper theme.colorScheme.onSurface usage throughout
‚Ä¢ Enhanced calendar edit screen theme support
‚Ä¢ Template manager screens fully theme-responsive

üìñ Enhanced Recipe Ingredient Selection

‚úÖ New Features:
‚Ä¢ Select specific recipe ingredients with interactive checkboxes
‚Ä¢ Add selected ingredients directly to shopping lists
‚Ä¢ Modern circular checkbox design with smooth ripple effects
‚Ä¢ Smart rate limiting prevents API conflicts
‚Ä¢ Optimized performance with 200ms delay between requests

üé® UI/UX Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Rounded corners for better visual consistency
‚Ä¢ Professional Material Design interactions
‚Ä¢ Ingredient counter badge shows selected items
‚Ä¢ Seamless integration with existing shopping list system

üîß Technical Enhancements:
‚Ä¢ Fixed rate limiting issues when adding multiple ingredients
‚Ä¢ Improved state management for ingredient selection
‚Ä¢ Enhanced dialog workflow for shopping list selection
‚Ä¢ Better error handling with user-friendly feedback

Critical Notes Sync Fix - Fixed notes not syncing between devices. Now loads both personal and family notes simultaneously with real-time auto-refresh every 15 seconds. Notes appear instantly across all your devices and stay perfectly synchronized. Technical improvements include comprehensive API endpoint integration, duplicate detection, enhanced provider state management, and proper memory cleanup. This update fixes the major sync issue where notes created on one device would not appear on others.

üîÑ Calendar Sync & Design Improvements

‚úÖ Calendar Sync Features:
‚Ä¢ Google Calendar sync with multi-account support
‚Ä¢ Apple Calendar integration for seamless workflow
‚Ä¢ Outlook Calendar sync for professional use
‚Ä¢ Select specific calendars to sync from each service
‚Ä¢ Toggle sync on/off for different calendar sources
‚Ä¢ Real-time sync status indicators

üé® Minimal Design Update:
‚Ä¢ Refined recipe import screen with subtle colors
‚Ä¢ Muted color palette for better visual consistency
‚Ä¢ Fixed calendar screen layout overflow issues
‚Ä¢ Enhanced minimal floating action buttons
‚Ä¢ Theme-responsive colors throughout the app
‚Ä¢ Professional glass card design system

üîß Technical Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive calendar sync dialogs with StatefulBuilder
‚Ä¢ Multi-select functionality with visual feedback
‚Ä¢ Proper state management for sync preferences
‚Ä¢ Enhanced calendar provider architecture
‚Ä¢ Improved user feedback with SnackBars
‚Ä¢ Better error handling for sync operations

üìù Notes System Implementation

‚úÖ Complete Notes Features:
‚Ä¢ Create and edit personal and family notes
‚Ä¢ Tags system for organizing notes
‚Ä¢ Pin important notes to keep them at the top
‚Ä¢ Share notes with family members or keep them private
‚Ä¢ Color coding for visual organization (blue, green, yellow, red, purple)
‚Ä¢ Full-text search across all notes and tags
‚Ä¢ Filter by private/shared notes and specific tags
‚Ä¢ Real-time updates and synchronization

üé® Modern UI/UX:
‚Ä¢ Beautiful glass card design consistent with app theme
‚Ä¢ Dynamic text expansion during note creation
‚Ä¢ Intuitive sharing controls
‚Ä¢ Enhanced note detail view with metadata
‚Ä¢ Seamless integration with existing family system

üîß Technical Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Complete backend API integration
‚Ä¢ Robust offline support with local storage fallback
‚Ä¢ Proper error handling and user feedback
‚Ä¢ Performance optimizations for large note collections

üìÖ Calendar UI Improvements

‚úÖ Light Mode Fixes:
‚Ä¢ Fixed unreadable appointment text in light mode
‚Ä¢ All calendar text now properly adapts to light/dark themes
‚Ä¢ Improved calendar event visibility across all lighting conditions
‚Ä¢ Enhanced appointment time and title readability

üóìÔ∏è Calendar Display Fixes:
‚Ä¢ Fixed incomplete calendar month display
‚Ä¢ Calendar now properly shows all days through month end
‚Ä¢ Increased calendar grid height for full 6-week view
‚Ä¢ Improved calendar day cell aspect ratio and layout

üé® UI/UX Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Better theme-responsive text colors throughout calendar
‚Ä¢ Enhanced calendar navigation and date selection
‚Ä¢ Improved glass card design consistency
‚Ä¢ Optimized calendar grid spacing and dimensions

üéØ Version 1.3.3 - AltStore Update Fix

‚úÖ Features from 1.3.2:
‚Ä¢ üé® Color coding for ToDos (same as Notes)
‚Ä¢ üîÑ Recurring event detection with auto-todo prevention
‚Ä¢ üìù Real-time Notes display updates
‚Ä¢ üêõ Fixed compilation errors

üìÖ Recurring Calendar Events:
‚Ä¢ Recurring calendar events with flexible scheduling
‚Ä¢ Birthdays that repeat yearly automatically
‚Ä¢ Weekly activities with custom duration (e.g., 4-week swimming course)
‚Ä¢ Daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly recurrence options
‚Ä¢ German localization for recurrence descriptions
‚Ä¢ Smart end date and occurrence limit controls

üîÑ AltStore Compatibility:
‚Ä¢ Version increment to enable AltStore updates

üéØ Version 1.3.2 - Complete Feature Update

‚úÖ New Features:
‚Ä¢ üé® Color coding for ToDos (same as Notes)
‚Ä¢ üîÑ Recurring event detection with auto-todo prevention

‚Ä¢ Weekly activities with custom duration (e.g., 4-week swimming course)
‚Ä¢ Daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly recurrence options

üîß Technical Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Enhanced CalendarEvent model with recurrence fields
‚Ä¢ Database schema updates for recurring events
‚Ä¢ RecurrenceType enum with user-friendly descriptions
‚Ä¢ Utility methods for generating recurring instances
‚Ä¢ Parent-child relationship for event instances
‚Ä¢ Performance optimizations with proper indexing

üöÄ User Experience:
‚Ä¢ Intuitive recurrence setup in calendar
‚Ä¢ Clear descriptions like 'W√∂chentlich (4 Mal)'
‚Ä¢ Automatic generation of recurring event instances
‚Ä¢ Better calendar organization for repeating events

üéØ Dashboard Improvements

‚úÖ Real Data Integration:
‚Ä¢ Fixed ManualTodo integration - no more property errors
‚Ä¢ Removed all static fake messages from dashboard
‚Ä¢ Dashboard now shows real todo data from your account
‚Ä¢ Added time-based greetings and icons (morning/evening)

üîß Technical Fixes:
‚Ä¢ Fixed assignedToUserId property usage
‚Ä¢ Fixed sharingType enum handling
‚Ä¢ Proper Consumer<ManualTodoProvider> integration
‚Ä¢ Improved dashboard data synchronization
‚Ä¢ Enhanced todo provider state management

üöÄ User Experience:
‚Ä¢ Dynamic greeting messages based on time of day
‚Ä¢ Real task counting and progress indicators
‚Ä¢ Authentic family activity overview
‚Ä¢ Better loading states and error handling

üöÄ Major Performance Update

‚Ä¢ Smart Caching System reduces API requests by 90%
‚Ä¢ No more rate limiting issues with tab switching
‚Ä¢ Fixed recipe deletion functionality
‚Ä¢ Resolved image loading issues
‚Ä¢ Improved mobile performance
‚Ä¢ Enhanced Provider state management
‚Ä¢ Added emergency rate limit reset functionality

üéØ Initial Release
